allow: Bash(for file in config/*.js models/*.js services/*.js controllers/*.js routes/*.js utils/*.js middleware/*.js)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add collapsible sidebar and fix dashboard UI

- Add collapsible sidebar with smooth animations
- Fix dashboard graphs with proper animations
- Add DashboardLayout component for responsive margin
- Add SidebarContext for state management
- Add layout files for all pages \(appointments, slots, settings, customers, calls\)
- Add .gitignore to exclude node_modules, .env, .next, etc.
- Add customers and calls placeholder pages

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
